description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Reach 2

+18 vs AC; 1d10+5 damage plus 1d6 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+18 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks or one bite attack, and then shifts 1 square.

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy enters or leaves an adjacent square,

+16 vs Fortitude; 1d10+5 damage, the target is knocked prone, and the dragon shifts 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+16 vs Reflex; 3d8+5 fire damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it. If the dragon is flying, it can shift up to 5 squares before making this attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Ranged 10

+16 vs Reflex; 2d6+5 fire damage. Effect: Each creature adjacent to the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +16 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
